alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 12:15PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy Snow showers will impact portions of Clinton, east central Franklin, north central Essex, Grand Isle, northwestern Chittenden and northwestern Franklin Counties through 100 PM EST... At 1214 PM EST, area observations and webcams indicated a band of heavier snow showers along a line extending from 8 miles north of Mooers to near Jericho to 8 miles northeast of Adirondack Regional Airport. Movement was generally east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than a half mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Plattsburgh, Plattsburgh International Airport, Peru, Beekmantown, Schuyler Falls, Chazy, Saranac, Mooers, Altona, Champlain, Grand Isle, St. Albans Town, South Alburgh, Alburgh, Alburgh Dunes State Park, North Hero, Isle La Motte, Clayburg, Dannemora and Rouses Point. This includes the following highways... Interstate 87 between mile markers 141 and 175. Interstate 89 between mile markers 118 and 129.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
